physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white negative of a photograph. It features a lady. She is standing and looking towards the direction in which the photograph was captured. There is a parasol that she has opened as well. She is wearing her ethnic costume and the background of the negative shows grass and trees.
sgcool_label_text: This plastic film negative shows a nyonya posing with a parasol.
title_text: Negative of a nyonya with a parasol
subject_terms_1: portraits women (female humans) folk costume Peranakan
subject_terms_2: Portrait photography Women Peranakan (Asian people) Ethnic costume
